Milt,
The shinsa is in September, Labor day weekend at the Doubletree hotel in Jersey City.  

Submit it with the o-seppa since they're interesting, but it won't really affect the judgment.  There will be one or two other kodogu shinsa-in so I will be sure to warn them about you.

Jim

  > 
  hahahaa, i leave that for you to see since you are the shinsa judge.
  This tsuba should be among the few i will be submitting  this coming 
  oct. shinsa .  By the way, should I submit the two giant shakudo seppa 
  together with is tsuba ( placing the seppa turns this tsuba into tachi 
  tsuba ) ?
  p.s.  Am I influencing the judge here ? =), no mistrial declare, I hope.

  milt
